DOC.brief_summary: 15 patients with narcolepsy and 15 healthy controls will be included in the study. According to a randomized, double-blind protocol they will receive intranasally at night first Orexine A and approximately two weeks later placebo or vice versa. Thereafter sleep will be recorded, the cytokine-system and neurocognition characterized.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intranasal Administration of Orexine A on IL-6-System, Sleep-Wake-Regulation and Neurocognition
DOC.criteria: Narcolepsy Age >18 Informed consent GERMAN fluently spoken Additional severe psychiatric or somatic disorders Pregnancy or nursing Anemia (Hb<10g/dl)
